directions: Place the rolled oats, cinnamon, cranberries, and blueberries in a microwave safe bowl. Add the turmeric and ginger, if desired. Pour in the water, and stir to mix ingredients. Cook on High until water is absorbed, about 2 minutes. Stir in orange juice to desired consistency.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
¼ cup orange juice, or as needed
title: Cranberry-Orange Spiced Oatmeal
